title: True statements about acceleration of SHO

content.description: An object is initially hanging in equilibrium from a vertical spring. The object is pulled down 15 cm from its equilibrium position, as illustrated above, and released at time t = 0. The object then oscillates with a period of 2.0 s. Let x = 0 be the equilibrium position and let the positive direction be upward.
content.question: Which of the following statements is true of the magnitude of the acceleration of the object at time t = 1.0 s?

choices.label: It has its minimum value that is not zero.
It has a value between zero and its maximum value.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
